overview:
Founder and President of JAS Holdings LTD. Has worked in the retail foodservice industry for 20-plus years and a 2 year stint in retail clothing. Born in Illinois which still resides with a wife (2004) with a child born in 2005.

Started the company in 2007 to pursue a life long dream to sustain a family tradition of entrepreuership. As CEO, he identifies acquisition and investment opportunities and direct implementation activities through a strategic plan of evaluating current market trends.
